function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Emergence of demand for new services and perspectives on park management","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Organizational change shifting focus from aesthetics to ecological management","category":"Organizational risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large number of urban green spaces managed by municipalities","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Underfunded municipal public services leading to inadequate maintenance of green spaces","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of public restrooms in municipal green spaces","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in funding sources and management autonomy of public service agencies","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of coordination between different municipal entities leading to ineffective management of urban green spaces","category":"Organizational risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient maintenance and operation decisions for urban green spaces due to fragmented responsibilities","category":"Organizational risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited focus on green spaces within the public services office leading to neglect and underfunding","category":"Organizational risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of clear definition for neighborhood and urban parks","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of regulatory focus on ecosystem services function of parks","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Underestimation of park scale and usage categories","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear governance structure for urban green spaces","category":"Organizational risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate governance leading to crowded urban green spaces","category":"Organizational risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of coordination in decision-making about urban green spaces","category":"Organizational risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of mobile device location data for data collection may raise privacy concerns.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Bias in data collection due to lower percentage of people with cell phones in poor areas.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of spreading contagious diseases due to mobility patterns and visitation to parks.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective pandemic response policies","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate communication and coordination between park management and health authorities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adaptive governance features","category":"Organizational risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Managers participating in congresses have access to knowledge and resources, creating a bias in the sample.","category":"Organizational risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of channels for managers who do not participate in associations or events to access different strategies or experiences.","category":"Organizational risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sparse literature on latin american urban green spaces","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Diversity of governance arrangements for parks and green spaces","category":"Organizational risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Recruiting interviewees through personal networks and non-profit organizations","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in visits to national parks across europe","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Surge in visitors to country parks in hong kong","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in visits to green areas near urban settlements as safer options","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential increase in health inequalities due to severe restrictions to mobility and park use during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wealthier residents less likely to risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in domestic violence due to covid-19 lockdown","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative impact of covid-19 on physical and mental health of residents due to lack of access to urban green spaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clear regulations for protecting urban green risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Community involvement in governance without clear coordination","category":"Organizational risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overlooking the role of urban green spaces in mitigating the spread of contagious diseases, such as covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of governance and regulation for urban green spaces, particularly in relation to disease mitigation","category":"Organizational risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited literature on the role of urban green spaces in disease provision and
